insert.foreach: INTO STUDENT (STU_ID, STU_NAME_KO, STU_NAME_EN, STU_REG1, STU_REG2, STU_EMAIL, STU_PHONE, STU_NATION, STU_GENDER, STU_ADDR1, STU_ADDR2, STU_BANK, STU_ACCOUNT, STU_POSTCODE) VALUES(#{item.A}, #{item.E}, #{item.F}, #{item.G}, #{item.H}, #{item.I}, #{item.J}, #{item.K}, #{item.L}, #{item.N}, #{item.O}, #{item.P}, #{item.Q}, #{item.M})
INTO ACADEMIC (STU_ID, DEPT_CODE, ACA_MAJOR, ACA_STATUS, ACA_GRADE, ACA_SEMESTER, ADMI_DATE) VALUES(#{item.A}, #{item.R}, #{item.S}, #{item.T}, #{item.U}, #{item.V}, '23/03/02')

INTO PROFESSOR (PRO_ID, DEPT_CODE, PRO_NAME_KO, PRO_NAME_EN, PRO_REG1, PRO_REG2, PRO_MAJOR, PRO_EMAIL, PRO_PHONE, PRO_NATION, PRO_GENDER, PRO_ADDR1, PRO_ADDR2, PRO_LAB_NUM, PRO_LAB_TEL) VALUES(#{item.A}, #{item.R}, #{item.E}, #{item.F}, #{item.G}, #{item.H}, #{item.S}, #{item.I}, #{item.J}, #{item.K}, #{item.L}, #{item.N}, #{item.O}, #{item.T}, #{item.U})

INTO EMPLOYEE (EMP_ID, DEPT_CODE, EMP_NAME_KO, EMP_NAME_EN, EMP_REG1, EMP_REG2, EMP_EMAIL, EMP_PHONE, EMP_NATION, EMP_GENDER, EMP_ADDR1, EMP_ADDR2, EMP_BANK, EMP_ACCOUNT, EMP_POSTCODE) VALUES(#{item.A}, #{item.R}, #{item.E}, #{item.F}, #{item.G}, #{item.H}, #{item.I}, #{item.J}, #{item.K}, #{item.L}, #{item.N}, #{item.O}, #{item.P}, #{item.Q}, #{item.M})
